author: Ngô Tuấn Tài <taideveloperapp@gmail.com> (https://github.com/taingo97)
name: @bnnsoftvn/react-native-biometrics-sic
summary: A React Native library for biometrics
description: React Native biometric functionality for signing and encryption

scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish
